definition.de: Produktion von Druckmaterialien wie Flyer, Werbeplakate, Schilder etc.
definition.dk: Produktion af trykte materialer såsom skilte, flyers og reklamer.
definition.en-GB: The production of printed matter such as flyers, ads, signs, etc.
definition.en-US: The production of printed matter such as flyers, ads, signs, etc.
definition.pt-BR: Produção de material impresso como panfletos, anúncios, letreiros etc.
definition.pt-PT: Produção de material impresso como panfletos, anúncios, letreiros, etc.
definition.se: Produktion av tryckt material såsom skyltar, flygblad och reklambad.
definition.zh-Hans: 传单、广告、标签等印制品生产
